mapper.select: SELECT ID , NAME , USER_ID , CODE , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_TIME FROM strategy WHERE 1=1 and ID = #{id}

SELECT a.id , b.last_version , c.sell_version , a.name , a.user_id , a.code , a.create_time , a.update_time FROM strategy a LEFT JOIN (SELECT aa.id, max(aa.version) as last_version FROM strategy_deploy aa WHERE aa.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY aa.id ) b on a.id = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT bb.id, max(bb.version) as sell_version FROM strategy_deploy bb WHERE bb.user_id = #{userId} AND bb.is_sell = 'selling' GROUP BY bb.id ) c on a.id = c.id WHERE 1=1 and user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
